mods.abstract: Two color window card (split fountain, purple to gold to navy, and split fountain, green to purple to orange, on white) announcing Mongrel Music 199 with Alejandro Excovedo, the Backsliders, Big Sandy and his Fly-Rite Boys, Boozoo Chavis, Buddy and Julie Miller, Chris Smither, Dave Alvin and the Guilty Men, Greg Trooper, the Iguanas, Jimmy Thackery and the Drivers, and Los Straitjackets, Paul Cebar and the Milwaukeeans, Peter Case, Reggae Cowboys, Robbie Fulks, Saffire-the Uppity Blues Women, Steve Forbert, Steve Riley and the Mamou Playboys, and Teddy Morgan. Poster features metal photoplates of a man and music notes.

subject.topic: Big Sandy and His Fly-Rite Boys (1994- )

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
